data.title: Sky Italy Summit 2023
data.meta_description: AGENDA 14:30-15:00 - Registration 15:00-15:15 - Welcome Rossella de Vivo, Production & Creative Hub Director, Sky ...
data.text:
AGENDA

14:30-15:00 – Registration

15:00-15:15 – Welcome

Rossella de Vivo, Production & Creative Hub Director, Sky Italia

Dante De Iulio, Sport production & Channel MGMT Director, Sky Italia

15:15-15:45 – Beyond the Screen: Revealing Serie B remote production

Dante De Iulio, Sport production & Channel MGMT Director, Sky Italia (moderator)

Ivan Pintabona, Chief Technology Officer, NVP

Fabio Ghezzi, Responsabile Area Audiovisivi e Produzione TV, Lega Serie B

Ferruccio Zanotti, Sky Sport Football Senior producer, Sky Italia

15:45-16:15 – Powering Up The Remote Production: MotoGP case study

Stefano Valsecchi, Sky Sport Senior PMO, Sky Italia (moderator)

Andrea Gianolli, CEO, ONE TV

Andrea Picchioni, Technical Operation Supervisor, Sky Sport

Giovanni Pippia, Media Facilities Senior Director, Dorna Sports

Michele Fornasiero, Head of Studios, Sky Italia

16:15-16:45 – Driving Success: Women leading the way in technology

Rossella de Vivo, Production & Creative Hub Director, Sky Italia (moderator)

Gabriella Vacca, CTO, Sky Italia & Group Director of Enterprise Technology Solutions

Mara Tanelli, Full Professor of Automatic Control, Politecnico di Milano

Scilla Signa, CEO, Bridge the Gaps & Founder, Hackher_

Ilaria Cortese, Talent, Development and D&I Director, Sky Italia

16:45-17:00 – Break

17:00-17:30 – Exploring the future: an insightful conversation on Future of Sport technologies and Generative AI

Riccardo Botta, Group Director Content Experience & Distribution ops, Sky (moderator)

Carlo De Marchis – Founder, FACTORY63 and Strategic Advisor, Cleng and BuzzMyVideos

17:30-18:00 – Blending Creativity and Innovation: The intersection of technology and storytelling

Omar Schillaci, Vicedirettore Sky TG24, Sky Italia (moderator)

Vincenzo Lagattolla, Head of Creative Hub, Sky Italia

Marco di Concetto, Head TV Production Systems Technologies, Mediaset

Claudia Severino, Director In-Partnership/All News Productions, Mediaset

Massimo Bertolotti, Communication & Infrastructure Senior Director, Sky Italia

18:00-19:30 – Drinks and networking

For all registration enquiries, please email [email protected]
